57851.name: Acid Shell
57851.description:
Adds corrosive properties to a shell that increase its penetration and damage potential. Upon causing damage to an enemy's vehicle, the shell applies a temporary effect to it, taking away {whiteSpanish_Open}up to %(damagePerDotEffectDuration)s{whiteSpanish_Close} of the enemy vehicle's HP {whiteSpanish_Open}within its %(dotEffectDuration)s s{whiteSpanish_Close} duration.

{parSecondary_Open}*The negative effect can be removed by a Repair Kit.{parSecondary_Close}

58107.name: Battlefield Robot

{parSecondary_Open}*Converted HP recovery also affects ally vehicles within a small range.{parSecondary_Close}
